code: import*as React from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import Card from"@mui/material/Card";import CardActions from"@mui/material/CardActions";import CardContent from"@mui/material/CardContent";import Button from"@mui/material/Button";import IconButton from"@mui/material/IconButton";import Typography from"@mui/material/Typography";import DeleteIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Delete";import{removeThought}from"../store/actions";import{baseUrl}from"../globals";import axios from"axios";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Thought=function Thought(props){var _props$data=props.data,_id=_props$data._id,thought=_props$data.thought,details=_props$data.details;var dispatch=useDispatch();var trimId=function trimId(id){return id.toString().slice(-4);};var deleteThought=function deleteThought(id){axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/thoughts/").concat(id)).then(function(res){console.log(res);dispatch(removeThought(id));});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"mx-2",sx:{maxWidth:270,minWidth:200},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-xs",children:["Thought ",trimId(_id)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:function onClick(){return deleteThought(_id);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteIcon,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",component:"div",children:thought}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{sx:{mb:1.5},color:"text.secondary",children:details})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardActions,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"small",children:"Learn More"})})]});};export default Thought;
